=== Artwork Team ===
A couple of refinements have been made to the forum theme.

=== Promotion Team ===
The LTS release party is taking shape. It will take place in Beekbergen on 2 June.

=== Forum Team ===
Spamfilters have been finetuned and the new moderation dashboard of SMF 2 has been tested.

=== Management Team ===
A lot of work has been done:
* The forum has been updated to SMF 2 and received a new theme.
* The main website has been moved from !MoinMoin to Drupal.
* The news site has received an update.
